media:group.media:title: The Story of Silent Night
media:group.media:description:
The quick video explains the creation of the Christmas carol, Silent Night, by Josef Mohr and Franz Gruber. Silent Night is one of the most famous Christmas carols in history, but who wrote it and why? 

Ryan M. Reeves (PhD Cambridge) is Associate Professor of Historical Theology at Gordon-Conwell Theological Seminary.  Twitter: https://twitter.com/RyanMReeves       Instagram: https://instagram.com/ryreeves4/ 

Blog: https://blogs.thegospelcoalition.org/ryanreeves/
